statusDetails.message:
`cy.request()` failed on:

https://1000and1songs.com/api/v1/news/1

The response we received from your web server was:

  > 404: Not Found

This was considered a failure because the status code was not `2xx` or `3xx`.

If you do not want status codes to cause failures pass the option: `failOnStatusCode: false`

-----------------------------------------------------------

The request we sent was:

Method: GET
URL: https://1000and1songs.com/api/v1/news/1
Headers: {
  "Connection": "keep-alive",
  "user-agent": "Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux x86_64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Cypress/13.6.6 Chrome/118.0.5993.159 Electron/27.1.3 Safari/537.36",
  "accept": "*/*",
  "accept-encoding": "gzip, deflate"
}

-----------------------------------------------------------

The response we got was:

Status: 404 - Not Found
Headers: {
  "server": "nginx/1.18.0 (Ubuntu)",
  "date": "Mon, 05 Aug 2024 10:30:12 GMT",
  "content-type": "application/json",
  "content-length": "27",
  "connection": "keep-alive",
  "x-process-time": "4 ms"
}
Body: {
  "detail": "No data found."
}
